data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Tumbrinck, Josef (2019): Taxonomic and biogeographic revision of the genus Lamellitettigodes (Orthoptera: Tetrigidae) with description of two new species and additional notes on Lamellitettix, Probolotettix, and Scelimena. Journal of Orthoptera Research 28 (2): 167-180, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/jor.28.34605, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/jor.28.34605
